client.main

Class ClientDeployment

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.main.ClientDeployment

  • public class ClientDeployment
extends java.lang.Object
    The main routine for the client deployment program running on each physical machine Just basically communicate with the server deployment controller, and then deploy VMs for each physical machine...
    Author:
    XySx
